decks.notes: This Pauper White Weenie Aggro deck focuses on flooding the board with cheap creatures like Lunarch Veteran, Squadron Hawk, and Novice Inspector to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Inspiring Overseer and Outlaw Medic provide buffs and protection, while cards like Guardians' Pledge and Battle Screech help go wide with tokens. Luxknight Breacher and Greatsword of Tyr offer additional power, with Prismatic Strands for defense. The deck also features some card draw and mana fixing with Raffine's Informant and Idyllic Grange. Overall, the strategy is to play aggressively and efficiently to win the game.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to flood the board with low-cost creatures like Lunarch Veteran, Novice Inspector, and Squadron Hawk, in order to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck also utilizes cards like Battle Screech and Rally the Peasants to provide additional damage from tokens, while Lightning Bolt provides direct damage to control the board. Prismatic Strands and Thraben Charm offer defensive options, while Faithless Looting and Thrilling Discovery help with card draw and filtering. Overall, the deck aims to be aggressive and fast-paced, using efficient creatures and spells to win the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble and protect the combo of Tireless Tribe and Inside Out to deal lethal damage to the opponent. The deck includes cards like Squadron Hawk to find combo pieces, Brainstorm and Ponder to filter through the deck, and Circular Logic and Dispel to protect the combo from disruption. Wedding Invitation, Whiteout, and Prismatic Strands provide additional ways to protect the combo or disrupt the opponent's plans. The deck also includes card draw spells like Deep Analysis and Impulse to keep the engine running smoothly.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with a swarm of low-cost, efficient creatures while maintaining card advantage and board presence. The deck utilizes cards like Kor Skyfisher, Militia Bugler, and Thraben Inspector to consistently put pressure on the opponent, while also utilizing cards like Prismatic Strands and Guardians' Pledge to protect your creatures and generate additional tokens. The deck aims to establish a fast and aggressive board presence, while also having the ability to protect and sustain that presence throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a combination of countering spells, removing threats, and card advantage through card draw and filtering. The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while also maintaining a strong board presence with creatures like Spellstutter Sprite and Ninja of the Deep Hours. The inclusion of cards like Thorn of the Black Rose and Murmuring Mystic provide additional value and win conditions. The mana base is designed to ensure consistency and support the deck's overall strategy.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells and removal spells, while also utilizing Gates to ramp up mana production. The main win condition is to stall the game with removal and board control until the player can establish a strong defensive wall with Guardian of the Guildpact and Outlaw Medic. The deck also utilizes card draw and filtering to maintain card advantage and ensure consistency in its control strategy. Overall, the deck aims to outlast and outmaneuver opponents through a combination of control and efficient use of Gates.

The deck focuses on quickly getting high-powered creatures like Myr Enforcer onto the battlefield using artifacts, while maintaining card advantage with Ichor Wellspring and Thoughtcast. Utilizing efficient removal like Galvanic Blast and Krark-Clan Shaman, as well as graveyard hate with Nihil Spellbomb, it aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of threats. Additionally, it includes ways to sacrifice artifacts for additional value with cards like Makeshift Munitions. The mana base is optimized for quick and consistent casting of spells, with a mix of artifact lands and colored sources.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. The goal is to apply constant pressure on the opponent's life total and finish them off with direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Fireblast. By efficiently using cards like Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery to generate card advantage, the deck aims to maintain a steady tempo while overwhelming the opponent with a flurry of fast, hard-hitting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly swarm the board with artifact creatures, using cards like Myr Enforcer and Refurbished Familiar. The deck also aims to gain advantages from sacrificing artifacts through cards like Ichor Wellspring and Nihil Spellbomb. Galvanic Blast serves as a good removal while Thoughtcast provides card draw. The mana base is optimized for generating mana quickly to be able to play multiple spells each turn. Overall, the deck is built to be a fast and efficient aggro deck that can overwhelm opponents with its artifact synergy.

The main concept of this Aggro - Affinity deck is to quickly flood the board with artifact creatures and utilize cards like Myr Enforcer and Refurbished Familiar to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cheap artifacts and cards like Galvanic Blast and Reckoner's Bargain, the deck focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently. Additionally, the deck includes some control elements like Krark-Clan Shaman and Nihil Spellbomb to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base is carefully constructed with artifact lands like Drossforge Bridge and Mistvault Bridge to support the affinity theme and ensure smooth gameplay.

The deck utilizes a high tide strategy to generate large amounts of mana in order to combo off and win the game quickly. It includes cards like Brainstorm, Merchant Scroll, and Peer Through Depths to find combo pieces and dig through the deck efficiently. Psychic Puppetry and Hidden Strings can be used to untap lands and generate even more mana. Once the combo pieces are assembled, the deck can draw through the deck with Ideas Unbound and LÃ³rien Revealed to find the win condition and secure the victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures and efficient removal spells to apply pressure on the opponent quickly. By combining aggressive creatures like Gixian Infiltrator and Krark-Clan Shaman with cards like Refurbished Familiar and Writhing Chrysalis, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Cast Down and Cleansing Wildfire help deal with opposing threats while maintaining board presence. The mana base is optimized to support the aggressive strategy while also providing some utility with cards like Bojuka Bog and Vault of Whispers.

This Jund aggro deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with artifact creatures and sacrificing them for value. Utilizing cards like Refurbished Familiar and Ichor Wellspring, the deck aims to generate card advantage and pressure the opponent with aggressive creatures like Nyxborn Hydra and Writhing Chrysalis. Removal spells like Cast Down and Galvanic Blast help maintain board control, while cards like Nihil Spellbomb and Cleansing Wildfire disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck's key strategy is to sacrifice creatures for card advantage and value, while overwhelming the opponent with a fast and aggressive game plan.

The main focus of the deck is to play aggressive creatures like Cryptic Serpent and Delver of Secrets early in the game, supported by low-cost spells such as Brainstorm, Counterspell, and Spell Pierce to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also utilizes cards like Tolarian Terror and Murmuring Mystic to further strengthen its board presence. With a heavy emphasis on card draw and tempo manipulation, Mono Blue Aggro aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory through efficient use of resources.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with low-cost, evasive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Tolarian Terror. By utilizing card draw and counterspells, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game and protect its threats while disrupting the opponent's game plan. LÃ³rien Revealed and Deem Inferior provide additional ways to buff creatures and close out games quickly. Overall, the deck prioritizes aggression and efficiency to overwhelm opponents and secure victories in a Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with low-cost creatures and using anthem effects to bolster their power. By overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of weenies, this aggro deck aims to deal consistent damage each turn and pressure the opponent into making suboptimal plays. The inclusion of card draw and protection spells ensures the deck can maintain momentum and recover from board wipes or removal spells. The synergy between creatures such as Squadron Hawk and Battle Screech allows for efficient token generation and constant pressure on the opponent.
